Posts.Content: pamelashawn wrote: Had Chemo 1, tomorow I will have chemo #2. last Thursday I started losing my hair in clumps so Sunday my husband shaved my head. I cried but got over it a step closer to recovery. I cant stand my head i have bald spots in my new hair buzz but look like a mangy dog. How long does it take before it all falls out?
